modName: Consuelo de Montoya -Bruja del Fuego- Fire Mage
summary: I have had several requests to do a standalone version of my Camilla Valerius replacer. Consuelo is available in Calculated level 40 and Auto-Level versions and has two optional hair styles each being a different shade of brown. She is located in the Old Hroldan Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[size= 4][color=red][center][b]Consuelo de Montoya -Bruja del Fuego- Fire Mage[/b][/center][/color][/size]

[b]I have had several requests for a standalone version of my Camilla Valerius replacer and so I created Consuelo. As with my Camilla mod I used a some facial features from the beautiful actress Ava Mendes (Fast and Furious 2 and Ghost Rider) and think my she turned out rather well (Note: I was not going for a direct copy of Ava). I tried to keep her lean for CBBEv3 so her settings put her at about 5\'6-7\" (.96) tall and her weight around 120-5 lbs (39) she is a member of the Imperial race but obviously I was going for a very Hispanic look with her. She is located in the Old Hroldan Inn. Her combat mechanics are from the hireling Belrand and uses fire based destruction and conjuring spells and perks.  

She is compatible with all body types and is available with two styles of ApachiiSkyHair, #04 and #29 and both are different shades of brown. (Again see pictures)[/b]

[b]ApachiiSkyhair is the only required mod!!!

That being said if you want her to look exactly like she does in my screenies you will need to use the mods below. 
Realistic Eyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3566
Bella\'s Better Faces with Makeup version 1:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
CBBEv3 with Navetseas CBBEv3 body texture and UNP Fitness Body - Also CBBE by Svarog. (Consuelo will work with all bodies!) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16731
Eyebrows: Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- Darker Feminine Brows D/L
Beauty Mark: Calientes Dirt to Beauty Marks
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=195
Pretty Lips by Danariel: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167
***Required***ApachiiSkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168[/b]

[color=chartreuse]She is wearing:
LustDesign - Female Daedric Armor Replacer - CBBEv3_UNP by Lustrianna: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17026
Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
Hentai Mixed Armor CBBEv3M by MAK
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13729
[/color]


[b]Thank you for checking out my mod and endorsements are always appreciated should you choose to download her and like my work!

Regards, 
FalmerBane[/b]
author: FalmerBane
